attributes.action: Stop all exams including vocational exams not just a levels and gcses
attributes.additional_details: How would you feel if you had to going in college and,all,you can,think about is if your going to catch the deadly covid and spread it to your family wouldnt you want to tell the government to stop all exams so please srop all exams until this virus as died down and its definaly safe to go back to schools and colleges think about your familys and our. were are all trying to stay,safe so this is me trying to keep my family abd others safe if you can,get the exams online,then great
attributes.background: Stop all exams including vocational exams not just a levels and gcses As we are important to keep safe as well this covid strain is more contagious and are family are at risk as well and it wont be fair fof us to complete the exan then give are familyies covid how would you feel if this was you
